程序包 org.springframework.boot.test.util

General purpose test utilities.

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    ApplicationContextTestUtils
    Application context related test utilities.
    EnvironmentTestUtils 已过时
    since 2.0.0 in favor of TestPropertyValues
    TestPropertyValues
    Test utilities for adding properties.
    TestPropertyValues.Pair
    A single name value pair.

    枚举 说明

    The type of property source.
